labels.text: ==THE GOAL==
As the FORTUNE HUNTER, your goal is to
acquire as many DIAMONDS from the maze
as you can. Beware, though, because the
labyrinth is filled with ZOMBIES, who
will strike at you as you move near
them. To attack a ZOMBIE, simply move
into them. The DIAMONDS are behind
locked DOORS that you will need KEYS
to open. To open a LOCK, simply move
into it. Finally, to exit the dungeon,
you will need an EXIT KEY which will
allow you to leave via the EXIT. There
are a lot of ZOMBIES, but despair not!
There are numerous POTIONS and SHIELDS
to help you, as well as ATTACK,
ARMOR, and HEALTH UPGRADES.
Best of luck, FORTUNE HUNTER!
==THE GOAL==
